title: M1 Tank Platoon 2 - PC CD ROM.rar
description:
In M1TP2 you take the role of a platoon/company commander, controlling 4 to 10 M1 Abrams Main Battle Tanks. These are supported, depending on the scenario, by further assets including:

    * M110 Armoured Personnel Carriers
    * M3 Bradley Armoured Fighting Vehicles
    * TOW Guided Missile Vehicles
    * Marine Armoured Personnel Carriers
    * Air Defence Vehicles
    * Cobra and Apache Helicopters
    * A-10 Thunderbolt Aircraft
    * Infantry Dragon Teams
    * Infantry Units
